query.description: Filter out collected movies. Possible values:  true , false .

By default, 10 results are returned. You can send a limit to get up to 100 results per page.

item.name: Get a user's personal lists (with OAuth)
Get a user's personal lists (without OAuth)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Star Wars in machete order",
  "description": "Next time you want to introduce someone to Star Wars for the first time, watch the films with them in this order: IV, V, II, III, VI.",
  "privacy": "public",
  "display_numbers": true,
  "allow_comments": true,
  "sort_by": "rank",
  "sort_how": "asc"
}
